item.title: j add a quote by Kathy Acker
item.description: "i am a limitless series of natural disasters and all of these disasters have been unnaturally repressed." -- Kathy Acker

item.title: j add a quote by Kathy Acker
item.description: "...'cause humans, above all, fear intelligence. how humans, scared out of their minds, gather whatever intelligence they can put their hands on and put it all in a central penitentiary named facts..." -- Kathy Acker

item.title: j add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Kiss me, and you will see how important I am." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: j add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Anyone who has lost something they thought was theirs forever finally comes to realise that nothing really belongs to them." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: j add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "If you're going to try, go all the way. Otherwise, don't even start. This could mean losing girlfriends, wives, relatives and maybe even your mind. It could mean not eating for three or four days. It could mean freezing on a park bench. It could mean jail. It could mean derision. It could mean mockery--isolation. Isolation is the gift. All the others are a test of your endurance, of how much you really want to do it. And, you'll do it, despite rejection and the worst odds. And it will be better than anything else you can imagine. If you're going to try, go all the way. There is no other feeling like that. You will be alone with the gods, and the nights will flame with fire. You will ride life straight to perfect laughter. It's the only good fight there is." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: j add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: j add a quote by Rob Sheffield
item.description: "It’s the same with people who say, ‘Whatever doesn’t kill you makes you stronger.’ Even people who say this must realize that the exact opposite is true. What doesn’t kill you maims you, cripples you, leaves you weak, makes you whiny and full of yourself at the same time. The more pain, the more pompous you get. Whatever doesn’t kill you makes you incredibly annoying." -- Rob Sheffield

item.title: j add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Every one of us is losing something precious to us. Lost opportunities, lost possibilities, feelings we can never get back again. That’s part of what it means to be alive." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: j add a quote by T.S. Eliot
item.description: "If you aren't in over your head, how do you know how tall you are?" -- T.S. Eliot

item.title: j add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "Pain is inevitable. Suffering is optional." -- haruki murakami

item.title: j add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Don't feel sorry for yourself. Only assholes do that." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: j add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "I want you always to remember me. Will you remember that I existed, and that I stood next to you here like this?" -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: j add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Tell him yes. Even if you are dying of fear, even if you are sorry later, because whatever you do, you will be sorry all the rest of your life if you say no." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: j add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "nothing in this world was more difficult than love." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: j add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "It's enough for me to be sure that you and I exist at this moment." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: j add a quote by José Saramago
item.description: "Don't be afraid, the darkness you're in is no greater than the darkness inside your own body, they are two darknesses separated by a skin, I bet you've never thought of that, you carry a darkness about with you all the time and that doesn't frighten you...my dear chap, you have to learn to live with the darkness outside just as you learned to live with the darkness inside" -- José Saramago

item.title: j add a quote by Djuna Barnes
item.description: "I have been loved,' she said, 'by something strange, and it has forgotten me." -- Djuna Barnes

item.title: j add a quote by Kathy Acker
item.description: "If you ask me what I want, I'll tell you. I want everything." -- Kathy Acker

item.title: j add a quote by Kathy Acker
item.description: "There must be a secret hidden in this book or else you wouldn't bother to read it" -- Kathy Acker

item.title: j add a quote by Haruki Marukami
item.description: "Whatever it is you're seeking won't come in the form you're expecting." -- Haruki Marukami

item.title: j add a quote by haruki murakami
item.description: "And once the storm is over, you won’t remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won’t even be sure, whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about." -- haruki murakami

item.title: j add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "A certain type of perfection can only be realized through a limitless accumulation of the imperfect." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: j add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "She likes to try everything, out of curiosity, but she'll be sorry if she isn't guided by her heart." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: j add a quote by audre lorde
item.description: "Caring for myself is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation, and that is an act of political warfare." -- audre lorde

item.title: j add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "This did not annoy Amanda for it had long been her theory that human beings were invented by water as a device for transporting itself from one place to another." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: j add a quote by Junot Díaz
item.description: "Nobody likes children, your mother assured you. That doesn't mean you don't have them." -- Junot Díaz

item.title: j add a quote by Bob Hope
item.description: "People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy." -- Bob Hope
